random.ex: NS is 0.9% NaCl and is isotonic with blood.

random.q: Which rhythm is shockable in the pulseless patient?
random.ex: Pulseless VT and VF are shockable rhythms.

random.q: First-line ventilatory support for conscious COPD exacerbation with increased work of breathing per protocol?
random.ex: CPAP reduces work of breathing and improves gas exchange.

random.q: 12-lead should be obtained within how many minutes of patient contact for suspected STEMI?
random.ex: Local rule set calls for a 12-lead within 5 minutes.
